description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a Voice over
IP gateway within the router is restarted.
This trap reports:
gateway slot
gateway configuration file name
gateway configuration file version.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwConfigInfo Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPHwSlot i 1 Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwConfigFileName s EXAMPLE Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwConfigFileVersion s EXAMPLE

description: Instance ID Slot, filled in by driver. For the ARN this
is a GAME slot which is always 1. For the FBR this is a PCI slot.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPHwSlot

description: A textual string to describe the name of VoIP config. file
to be download on to router flash card. The image name should
be a fully qualified filename. For ex: vol:filename.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwConfigFileName

description: A textual string to describe the version of the
voice gateway config file.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwConfigFileVersion

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the
wfVoIPGwEnable state changes.
Instance ID Slot, filled in by driver. For the ARN this
is a GAME slot which is always 1. For the FBR this is a PCI slot.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPHwSlot

description: Enables or disables voice gateway.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPGwEnable

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the
wfVoIPState state changes.
Instance ID Slot, filled in by driver. For the ARN this
is a GAME slot which is always 1. For the FBR this is a PCI slot.
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPHwSlot

description: Line driver state variable: Not Present,
Init, Down, Up, Configured, Connected
variables.name: Wellfleet-VOIP-MIB::wfVoIPState
